transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good morning. Rajesh India Mart last time pesunengala?
Customer: Ha, sollunga Rajesh.
Executive: Sir sign out panthom illa sir nama nethu.
Executive: Aah, illa Rajesh pannala.
Customer: Oh. Sir is it possible to just hold two minutes?
Executive: Enna problem irukku Rajesh?
Customer: Sollunga.
Customer: Seri sir na eppovum call panrathu Monday ingala?
Executive: Yeah yeah.
Customer: Monday call panrathu sir. Enna seri ok sir. First half or second half sir enna Monday busy irukinga?
Executive: Obviously, athu ipo na solla mudiyathu. Monday I will get.
Customer: Ok. Seri ok sir Monday na call panren.
Customer: Aah seri seri seri seri.
Customer: Thank you sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks if they signed out yesterday.

- Customer asks when to call on Monday.



Resolution:

- Executive said they did not sign out yesterday.

- Executive said he will be available on Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- sign out, monday call, availability
